ygData.subject: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: Well i m almost level 16 now and I m starting to look around for info on the research skill and so far whound up with useless info, nothing concrete yet. So
ygData.messageBody:
Well i'm almost level 16 now and I'm starting to look around for info on the
research skill and so far whound up with useless info, nothing concrete yet.
So what i wanted to know is there anyone on this list who has a good list of
the runes and the location to get them or a website who has a good list.
Thank for the help.


>From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_wizards] no prejudices
>Date: Fri, 04 Jun 1999 21:39:47 GMT
>
>From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
>
>I agree, good point. On that note, for some of the younger wizards, you'll
>find a percieved hatred of our class in certain areas...notoriously because
>of our abilities to strike from afar, and more likely because you are
>playing with others who are ignorant of class balance.
>
>Places that are sometimes hostile to Wizards include BlackBurrow around the
>Queynos area, and Crushbone over near Felwithe. I would say those in BB
>were more hostile to our class...more sensitive to issues about steal kills
>and such. Of course, there ARE those wizards I have seen that have used
>their powers to exploit others and place shame on our class. I'd like to
>name names...but.......nah. :)
>
>Once I hit 16...it was amazing how many groups start looking favorable to
>our class. Start looking in areas such as Highhold Pass and Unrest...
>people are always ready to allow a Wizard in the group. So don't dispair
>folks...the wait isn't THAT long. :)
>
>-- Lim'Dul
>18 Wizard Veeshan
>
>>I think Verant tend to ignore any whine "we are underpowered". But >they
>>definitively won't ignore "people don't want to group with me for >reason
>>X"
>>when the reason X is *objective* (such as the magic resistance >factor),
>>as
>>opposed to a dislike based on perceived prejudice (rogues suck -
>> >enchanter
>>suck and so on)
>
>
